description.value:
Tries to keep catastrophically injured users alive for a time. Gives Autosanguine Trait, and may provide a 50% chance to not die from blood loos or other normally fatal wounds (GM Discretion, likely can't help with decapitation). Common Craftsmanship lasts 4 hours, Good and Best last 2x and 3x as long.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
